snippet.title: Vindefiant - Reveal Trailer (Updated)
snippet.description:
For clarity, this trailer doesn't showcase any new features, just some updates to the dialogue system.
Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2786020/Vindefiant/
Game Discord: https://vindefiantdisc.com/

A disgruntled employee is fired from his job, sparking a path of rage and destruction. Lead Alyx through his journey of vengeance and creatively kill enemies in this pixel-art adventure where you, are the villain.
